IF(A.ADVT_SMS_RCV_AGRMT_YN='1','Y',IF(A.ADVT_SMS_RCV_AGRMT_YN='2','N',IF(A.ADVT_SMS_RCV_AGRMT_YN='X','미상','미입력'))) AS ADVT_SMS_RCV_AGRMT_YN , IF(A.PNT_USE_RSVNG_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='1','Y',IF(A.PNT_USE_RSVNG_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='2','N',IF(A.PNT_USE_RSVNG_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='X','미상','미입력'))) AS PNT_USE_RSVNG_PUSH_AGRMT_YN , IF(A.BNFT_MLF_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='1','Y',IF(A.BNFT_MLF_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='2','N',IF(A.BNFT_MLF_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='X','미상','미입력'))) AS BNFT_MLF_PUSH_AGRMT_YN , IF(A.TUSE_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='1','Y',IF(A.TUSE_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='2','N',IF(A.TUSE_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='X','미상','미입력'))) AS TUSE_PUSH_AGRMT_YN , IF(A.COIN_NOTI_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='1','Y',IF(A.COIN_NOTI_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='2','N',IF(A.COIN_NOTI_PUSH_AGRMT_YN='X','미상','미입력'))) AS COIN_NOTI_PUSH_AGRMT_YN , IF(A.LOC_UTLZ_AGRMT_YN='1','Y',IF(A.LOC_UTLZ_AGRMT_YN='2','N',IF(A.LOC_UTLZ_AGRMT_YN='X','미상','미입력'))) AS LOC_UTLZ_AGRMT_YN , IF(A.BLTH_AGRMT_YN='1','Y',IF(A.BLTH_AGRMT_YN='2','N',IF(A.BLTH_AGRMT_YN='X','미상','미입력'))) AS BLTH_AGRMT_YN FROM OCB.MART_TOT_AGRMT_MGMT_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD') B ON A.MKTNG_FNL_AGRMT_SRC_ORG_CD = B.DTL_CD WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId}

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(MAX(A.REG_DTTM), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS OCBAPP_FNL_ENTR_DT , FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(MAX(B.LOG_DTTM), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') As OCBAPP_FNL_LGN_DT FROM OCB.DW_TCH_USR_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN OCB.DW_USR_LGN_SESS_INFO B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID WHERE A.MBR_ID = #{mbrId}

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.RCV_DT, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS RCV_DT , A.RCV_SEQ AS RCV_SEQ , FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(A.APPR_DT,A.APPR_TM), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS APPR_DTTM , A.REP_APPR_NO AS REP_APPR_NO , A.APPR_NO AS APPR_NO , FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(A.SALE_DT,A.SALE_TM), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS SALE_DTTM , A.MBR_ID AS MBR_ID , A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD AS CARD_DTL_GRP_CD , E.DTL_CD_NM AS CARD_DTL_GRP_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD, E.DTL_CD_NM) AS CARD_DTL_GRP , FUNCS.SECUAESDECRYPT(A.CARD_NO) AS CARD_NO , A.ALCMPN_CD AS ALCMPN_CD , B.ALCMPN_NM AS ALCMPN_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.ALCMPN_CD, B.ALCMPN_NM) AS ALCMPN , A.MCNT_CD AS MCNT_CD , C.MCNT_NM AS MCNT_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.MCNT_CD, C.MCNT_NM) AS MCNT , A.STLMT_MCNT_CD AS STLMT_MCNT_CD , D.MCNT_NM AS MCNT_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.STLMT_MCNT_CD, D.MCNT_NM) AS STLMT_MCNT , A.PNT_KND_CD AS PNT_KND_CD , F.DTL_CD_NM AS PNT_KND_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.PNT_KND_CD, F.DTL_CD_NM) AS PNT_KND , A.SLIP_CD AS SLIP_CD , G.DTL_CD_NM AS SLIP_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.SLIP_CD, G.DTL_CD_NM) AS SLIP , A.SALE_AMT AS SALE_AMT , A.OCC_PNT + AVL_PNT AS PNT , A.CS_MBR_CMMSN AS CS_MBR_CMMSN , A.CMMSN AS CMMSN , A.PMNT_WAY_CD AS PMNT_WAY_CD , H.DTL_CD_NM AS PMNT_WAY_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.PMNT_WAY_CD, H.DTL_CD_NM) AS PMNT_WAY , A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD , I.DTL_CD_NM AS ORG_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.ORG_CD, I.DTL_CD_NM) AS ORG , A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD AS OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD , J.DTL_CD_NM AS OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD, J.DTL_CD_NM) AS OIL_PRDCT_SGRP , CASE WHEN LENGTH(TRIM(A.STLMT_MCNT_CD)) <> 5 OR A.STLMT_MCNT_CD IN ('BOHUM','HOMEP','PINIX') THEN 0 ELSE SALE_QTY END AS SALE_QTY , A.CPN_PRD_CD AS CPN_PRD_CD , K.PRD_NM AS CPN_PRD_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.CPN_PRD_CD, K.PRD_NM) AS CPN_PRD , CASE WHEN LENGTH(TRIM(A.STLMT_MCNT_CD)) <> 5 OR A.STLMT_MCNT_CD IN ('BOHUM','HOMEP','PINIX') THEN '01' ELSE '02' END AS TRX_TYPE FROM ( SELECT RCV_DT ,RCV_SEQ ,APPR_DT ,APPR_TM ,REP_APPR_NO ,APPR_NO ,SALE_DT ,SALE_TM ,MBR_ID ,CARD_DTL_GRP_CD ,CARD_NO ,ALCMPN_CD ,MCNT_CD ,STLMT_MCNT_CD ,PNT_KND_CD ,SLIP_CD ,SALE_AMT ,OCC_PNT,AVL_PNT ,CS_MBR_CMMSN ,CMMSN ,PMNT_WAY_CD ,ORG_CD ,OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD ,SALE_QTY ,CPN_PRD_CD FROM OCB.DW_SALE_CTNT
UNION ALL
SELECT RCV_DT ,RCV_SEQ ,APPR_DT ,APPR_TM ,REP_APPR_NO ,APPR_NO ,SALE_DT ,SALE_TM ,MBR_ID ,CARD_DTL_GRP_CD ,CARD_NO ,ALCMPN_CD ,MCNT_CD ,STLMT_MCNT_CD ,PNT_KND_CD ,SLIP_CD ,SALE_AMT ,OCC_PNT,AVL_PNT ,CS_MBR_CMMSN ,CMMSN ,PMNT_WAY_CD ,ORG_CD ,OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD ,SALE_QTY ,CPN_PRD_CD FROM OCB.DW_MTH07_PREV_SALE_CTNT
UNION ALL
SELECT RCV_DT ,RCV_SEQ ,APPR_DT ,APPR_TM ,REP_APPR_NO ,APPR_NO ,SALE_DT ,SALE_TM ,MBR_ID ,CARD_DTL_GRP_CD ,CARD_NO ,ALCMPN_CD ,MCNT_CD ,STLMT_MCNT_CD ,PNT_KND_CD ,SLIP_CD ,SALE_AMT ,OCC_PNT,AVL_PNT ,CS_MBR_CMMSN ,CMMSN ,PMNT_WAY_CD ,ORG_CD ,OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD ,SALE_QTY ,CPN_PRD_CD FROM OCB.DW_MTH37_PREV_SALE_CTNT ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN OCB.DW_ALCMPN_MST B ON A.ALCMPN_CD = B.ALCMPN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN OCB.DW_MCNT_MST C ON A.MCNT_CD = C.MCNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN OCB.DW_MCNT_MST D ON A.STLMT_MCNT_CD = D.ALCMPN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_DTL_GRP_CD') E ON A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD = E.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'PNT_KND_CD') F ON A.PNT_KND_CD = F.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'SLIP_CD') G ON A.SLIP_CD = G.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'PMNT_WAY_CD') H ON A.PMNT_WAY_CD = H.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD') I ON A.ORG_CD = I.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CAR_OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD') J ON A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD = J.DTL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN OCB.DW_CPN_PRD_MST K ON A.CPN_PRD_CD = K.CPN_PRD_CD WHERE A.MBR_ID = #{mbrId}

SELECT RCV_DT , RCV_SEQ , APPR_DTTM , REP_APPR_NO , APPR_NO , SALE_DTTM , MBR_ID , CARD_DTL_GRP , CARD_NO , ALCMPN , MCNT , STLMT_MCNT , PNT_KND , SLIP , SALE_AMT , PNT , CS_MBR_CMMSN , CMMSN , PMNT_WAY , ORG , OIL_PRDCT_SGRP , SALE_QTY , CPN_PRD , TRX_TYPE FROM MOCK_TB_SEL_TRX_HIST WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId}

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.SND_DT, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS SND_DT , B.EMAIL_TITL AS EMAIL_TITL , A.LCPT_EMAIL_SND_RSLT_CD AS LCPT_EMAIL_SND_RSLT_CD , C.DTL_CD_NM AS LCPT_EMAIL_SND_RSLT_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ' , A.LCPT_EMAIL_SND_RSLT_CD, C.DTL_CD_NM) AS LCPT_EMAIL_SND_RSLT FROM OCB.DW_EMAIL_SND_RSLT_CTNT A JOIN OCB.DW_EMAIL_SND_CTNT B ON A.SYS_SRC_CD = B.SYS_SRC_CD AND A.MSG_ID = B.MSG_ID AND A.SUB_MSG_ID = B.SUB_MSG_ID AND A.MSG_GRP_ID = B.MSG_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'EMAIL_SND_RSLT_CD') C ON A.LCPT_EMAIL_SND_RSLT_CD = C.DTL_CD WHERE A.SRC_IDNTF2_ID = #{mbrId} ORDER BY SND_DT DESC

SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.SND_DTTM, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS SND_DTTM , A.MSG_TITL AS MSG_TITL , A.PUSH_SND_RSLT_CD AS PUSH_SND_RSLT_CD , B.DTL_CD_NM AS PUSH_SND_RSLT_NM , CONCAT_WS(' / ', A.PUSH_SND_RSLT_CD, B.DTL_CD_NM) AS PUSH_SND_RSLT FROM OCB.DW_PUSH_SND_LOG_CTNT A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTL_CD, DTL_CD_NM FROM OCB.DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'PUSH_SND_RSLT_CD') B ON A.PUSH_SND_RSLT_CD = B.DTL_CD WHERE MBR_ID = #{mbrId} ORDER BY SND_DTTM DESC
